body.name: Hannah Linen Disposable Face Mask, 3-Ply Protection with Comfortable Nose Clip and Ear Loops for Adult Men, Women, and Teens
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 16. Order within 6 hrs 12 mins
features: Comfortable Protection All Day Long - Made with high-quality breathable material so you can breathe smoothly even while wearing it for longer periods of time. Our black mask disposable also comes with a highly elastic soft ear loop to eliminate pressure around the ears.
Reliable 3-Layer Filtration - Our paper mask is made of three layers. Each layer is made of high-quality polypropylene. The high-quality non-woven fabric is more breathable and won’t agitate skin.

Adjustable Nose Bridge, One Size Fits Most - This disposable face mask properly fits a wide assortment of face shapes and sizes. Suitable for ages 15 and above. Just hold the elastic bands over your ears and press the versatile metal strip around your nose to create a light seal around your face.

Great for Daily Tasks at Home and Outdoors - This personal protective face mask is intended to be worn as a precautionary measure. Great for indoor and outdoor activities like public transportation, exercise, sports, workplaces, etc. Not suitable for use in high-risk or medical situations.

Complete Your Personal Care Pack - Stock up on your personal care essentials. Include a Hannah Linen face mask pack to your daily care kit and be ready to face the world anytime. Each pack includes 50 pieces of black face masks.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Waterproof Outer Layer Our disposable face mask has a waterproof outer layer to repel liquid droplets. Reliable protection. Perfect for daily use. 3-Ply Protection Comprised of 3 protective layers – soft, comfortable, and breathable. Skin-friendly and won’t cause irritation. Adjustable Nose Clip One size fits most. Features an adjustable nose clip so it can fit a wide assortment of face shapes and sizes, creating a snug yet gentle seal around your face. Comfortable Ear Loop Won’t hurt your ears even after wearing for long periods. Provides comfortable protection anytime, anywhere. Perfect personal care pack for home and office, school and outdoors, service staff, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s light and easy to wear. This is my second purchase.
reviews.reviewText: It’s a good product. I use it and give it to friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Would be great if they didn’t break after a few mins of wearing them…
reviews.reviewText: Update: I increased the star rating after the company reached out to me to make things right… they sent a new box of masks for my daughter and these seem to be working well!My daughter was so excited to get these as she has to wear a mask everyday in school and the black ones were impossible to find in stores. They fit good and were breathable but each one has broken a few mins/hours into wearing. I was hoping for the price they would be decent quality and last her a while but not when she has to change them 4-5 times a day because the keep breaking… very disappointed!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 30, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Ordered my masks June 19, 2020, sold and shipped by Amazon (then). They arrived 10 days later.Product seems generic. Box has picture of medical personnel and is labeled "Disposable Face Masks ~ Bacterial Filtration Efficiency (BFE) > 95%" (maybe trying to latch onto "N95" fame?). Nothing about Hannah Linen or country of origin. Company name is "medipro supply" and "makeursati-supply-inc.com" with a Brooklyn NY address. Inside the box is a resealable plastic bag with both Chinese and English writing, including "This product is non-medical device." Manufacturer name is in Chinese writing. Inside that is a sealed plastic bag with the masks inside. Also a small paper "Qualified Certificate" with both Chinese and English writing, including production date 2020/4/18.The mask itself appears to be standard for its type (I've used two others). I verified it was breathable material by holding it tightly to my face and inhaling and exhaling for a minute or so. The fit and dimensions are about the same but the ear loops took a bit more effort to attach, caused by the elastic not being as "stretchy" as the others. I put on and took off the mask multiple times but elastic didn't loosen up. Another difference is the metal nose piece, which seems to be of thinner material than the others, but it does work. Overall, these are usable for my purpose, which is to meet masking requirements during the COVID-19 lockdown.Please note: given the generic nature of the product, I don't know that you will receive what I did.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived a week ahead of time
reviews.reviewText: Nice appearance, soft to face, fits well, I have a heart shaped face, elastic is stretchy. they MIGHT be resueable a few times if one follows the CDC guidelines of palcing seperately in a paper bag and let sit in a warm place two days to inactivate the virus if you are purchasing them for COVID. However, i will be using them in a lecture lab situation which is fully opened but has the number of students cut in half for social distancing and will be continuously be masked both students and faculty. I will OBVIOUSLY, for the students, dispose of them at the end of a lecture / lab cycle to model proper protocol for use and disposal. There are fifty per pack and I will use two for one day so will be able to cover 25 lecture / lab days . I plan to reorder another package. In terms of appearance, they appear "soft" and have a very slight "texture" but not very much. Should look very "professional" with my normal attire of a black suit and white shirt or white lab coat that is washed daily. Highly recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars it was a gift
reviews.reviewText: My cousin needed them as she sometimes uses them while she is cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars just basic mask

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This is my second time ordering these masks. I had no issues the first time. This time they were thinner and the ear loops kept breaking.. Will not be ordering again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love ❤️ them.
reviews.reviewText: There’s nothing to dislike. They are light weight, and the straps doesn’t hurt my ears. I like the fact that you can get them get them in different colors too. If I’m going out. It’s the first thing I grab coming out the house.

reviews.reviewTitle: they are good if you use two
